name: SeriesInfo
0:
”Alexa, ask Series Info for info on downton abbey”
”Alexa, ask Series Info for details on downton abbey”
”Alexa, ask Series Info when the next episode of the walking dead airs”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: series info
des:
Get different information on your favorite TV shows like when the next episode airs or just general information. Uses TV-Maze API for data.

You can try some commands like:
Alexa, ask Series Info when the next episode of [show name] airs.
Alexa, ask Series Info for details on [show name].
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
